title: Thomas Edison National Historical Park: Education
body: Innovate Like Edison   "If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves" -Thomas A. Edison     **UPDATE** We will be taking reservations for the 2016/17 school year starting August 10th.  We will also be setting up Skype sessions for the school year through Microsoft Education. Please call the number below or e mail us for more information on Skype in the Classroom.  Let us bring OUR park into YOUR classroom. If you have any questions about your reservations or would like more information about setting up a Skype session please call: 973-736-0550 ext. 33.                 Parks as Classrooms Come take a ranger lead tour of the laboratory complex Read More        Listen to Early Sound Recordings The phonograph is one of Thomas Edison's most famous inventions, but what did these recordings sound like? Just click, listen and enjoy! Read More        Are You the Next Thomas Edison? Will your experiments end in success or disaster?  Would you pass Edison's employment test?  Find out in our online games. Read More
